name: Zolga - The Ship Waker (GWJ35)
description:
In Zolga and the Didgeridoo of Space (from GWJ 26 - download here), a prehistoric man named Zolga has met his new extraterrestrial friend - Any. 

In the end (yes, spoilers!), they have found a secret recipe for a food called bread.

Now, in this sequel Zolga - The Ship Waker, they will have to find out what to do with this recipe, and turns out there is something else going on.

If you want to play the quasi-sequel to this game, you can play Test Pilot (download here).

Game made for GWJ 35, with the theme Lost Tech. The wildcards used were:

Unreliable Narrator -  Include a narrator or guide who provides unreliable advice for the player
Redacted - Include _______________ in your game

____________________________________________________________________

This game was made in 5 days (Wednesday to Sunday), reusing some assets from both the 2 games mentioned (Didgeridoo of Space and Test Pilot).

Voices:

Any: JohnGabrielUK
Zolga: Vela
System: TTS voice "Amy"
